newsitem.title: USA: Callware names new chairman, president and CEO.
newsitem.headline: Callware names new chairman, president and CEO.

text.p: CallWare Technologies Inc said Wednesday it named Robert Johns to the post of chairman and Reino Kerttula president and chief executive.
R. Craig Hansen has resigned from these three positions for personal reasons, Callware said.

The computer telephony company said Hansen has found it difficult to run the day-to-day operations since he relocated his family closer to his ailing parents. Hansen, who is also the company's largest stockholder, said he plans to stay involved in key strategic relations.
Kerttula, co-founder of CallWare, has been a director, executive vice president and chief operating officer of the Computer telephony company.
Johns has been a director, executive officer and also was a co-founder of the company, Callware said.
The company has offices in Salt Lake City, Chicago, and Herzlia, Israel.
